## Data load

```{r}
#Loading libraries
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#creating raw file
raw_dir <- "data/_raw/"
```

```{r}
raw_dir <- "data/_raw/"

if( !dir.exists(raw_dir) ){
  dir.create(path = raw_dir)
}

data_url <- "https://archive.ics.uci.edu/static/public/565/bone+marrow+transplant+children.zip"

download.file(
    url = data_url,
    destfile = str_c("data/_raw/","bone-marrow.arff")
    )
```
